data.name: SIR ABANDON
data.detailed_description:
The project of this game was conceived in 2017. It is an RPG type game, in retro 2D. You play as a knight Sir Abandon who will evolve through many levels.


You will have to collect enough gold to improve your equipment, and for this you will have to do and redo the same levels several times.


You will also need to kill simple small enemies to gain experience. Like Slimes, Bats, and other whimsical creatures. The world of Sir Abandon is heavily populated with them, which will make it easy for you to level up.


But, you will also come across monsters that are much smarter, more powerful, and which will be more difficult to defeat.


Once the experience bar is full, you will pass a level, which in addition to your improvements in armor, weapons, and other equipment, will allow you to increase in power. To be able to be equipped with the equipment whose minimum level will be required.


The world in which Sir Abandon will travel in search of his destiny will be strewn with pitfalls, quests, and friends who will help him defeat the Gorilla of Alvina !

But, you will also come across monsters that are much smarter, more powerful, and which will be more difficult to defeat.


Once the experience bar is full, you will pass a level, which in addition to your improvements in armor, weapons, and other equipment, will allow you to increase in power. To be able to be equipped with the equipment whose minimum level will be required.

data.short_description: It is an RPG type game, in 2D retro. You play as a knight (Sir Abandon) who will evolve through many levels. You will have to farm certain levels several times to increase your experience and gain levels, as well as collect enough gold to improve your equipment.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows XP SP2 or later
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 Ghz or higher
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
